events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product doesn't meet my expectations and I want to request a refund.
The case has been classified under refund as the customer requests their money back for the order.
Assigning this refund case to agent Sarah T. for resolution and next steps.
Hello! I’m Sarah, here to help you with your refund request. Could you please share your order number?
To process your refund quickly, I need the order number and any details about what was wrong with the product.
Sure, the order number is 845672. The item was not as described and I’m quite disappointed with the quality.
Thank you for the info. I have initiated the refund process; the money should be back in your account within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate how fast you handled this refund request.
The refund has been processed successfully. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that your refund has been received and you are happy with the resolution.
Closing this case as completed following confirmation of refund receipt and customer satisfaction.
We have sent you a survey to gather feedback about your recent refund experience with us.
